name: Knowledge Domain
description: Clerics of the Knowledge Domain value learning and understanding above all, using divine insight to master skills, languages, and secrets both mundane and mystical.

1.name: Knowledge Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Blessings of Knowledge
1.description: You learn two languages of your choice and gain proficiency (and expertise) in two of the following skills: Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages
2.description: You gain proficiency with one skill or tool of your choice for a short duration.

6.name: Channel Divinity: Read Thoughts
6.description: You can read a creatureâ€™s surface thoughts, and then potentially cast suggestion without expending a spell slot.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: You add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

17.name: Visions of the Past
17.description: You can call up visions of the past that reveal information about an object or location.
